analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x3f3992435e429d81442115483d97c6474d315341.sol:
	Contract SignkeysToken has payable functions:
	 - approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f3992435e429d81442115483d97c6474d315341.sol#660-667)
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x3f3992435e429d81442115483d97c6474d315341.sol#667-668)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
